SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CONSTITUENT_HAS_CONSTITUENCYCODE
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Checks if a given constituent has the given constituency code
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CONSTITUENT_HAS_CONSTITUENCYCODE( @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier, -- con id of the constituent @CONSTITUENCYCODEID uniqueidentifier -- constituency code id to look for ) RETURNS int with execute as caller AS BEGIN -- Declare the return variable here DECLARE @Result int declare @ID uniqueidentifier
-- Add the T-SQL statements to compute the return value here select @ID = ID from dbo.CONSTITUENCY where CONSTITUENTID = @CONSTITUENTID and CONSTITUENCYCODEID = @CONSTITUENCYCODEID and (DATEFROM is null or DATEFROM <= GETDATE()) and (DATETO is null or GETDATE() <= DATETO)
if @ID is null set @Result = 0; else set @Result = 1;
-- Return the result of the function RETURN @Result
END
